name: Slick Stitchin'
description:
Slick Stitchin' was made by Sheridan College Game Design students for Design Week Winter 2023

Slick Stitchin' is a playground/simulation of the tranquil act of sewing stuffed animals together. Players puncture holes in the fabric of their future virtual pets, guiding thread through them to form them into the beloved childhood friends they were always meant to be. The aim of the game is to take the 2D Sewing pattern of the animals and stitch each segment together until the animal is in its final form.

Made by: Victoria Regier, Kris Strakhov, Beric O'Neil, Gabrielle Anonuevo-Carreon, Michael Poulos and Sydney Davio
